page.title: 02TROON Cornwall - Housing
page.content: With a population of over 3,000 TROON is one of the fastest growing villages in the county. The majority of its inhabitants live on the Grenville Estate, an estate of council housing, to the north east of the village centre. The remaining inhabitants live in more traditional granite faced cottages built around the turn of the century or more modern bungalows built in the 1950's and 1960's. Outside TROON the population live in small communities like Bolenowe or Carwynnen or in individual farms and cottages spread throughout the area.
